explanation: based on the historical price data provided, meta has shown a consistent upward trend over the last year, moving from a low of 106.40 in november 2022 to 328.49 in november 2023. this represents a significant increase in value, suggesting strong momentum that could continue into december 2023. in contrast, dis has been relatively flat, gme has been declining, and spy, while increasing, has not shown as much growth as meta. given the strong performance and upward trend of meta, it is reasonable to expect that it may continue to perform well through the end of december 2023. therefore, investing 10000 dollars in meta could potentially yield the highest profit when sold at the end of the month, assuming the trend continues and no unforeseen market events affect the stock price.
